Articles.Content: When I try to physics warp in space using the alt and comma key comb. , the time warp bar flashes then goes back to normal time warp. I have better time warp installed. Any solutions?

Try alt + full stop? Comma (<) decreases warp speed, full stop (>) increases it.

Check the better time warp thread, maybe others have reported the same thing there.
Your question has been moved to the support subforum. Good luck with it.
